title: I want to free up some space on my Pixel 3 but only the older ones not erverything
content:
Hi I want to free up some space on my Pixel 3 but they only give me the option to remove erverything. I want to keep the most recent ones and just a few of the older photos. Is there something where I can choose what to remove and what to keep.
Thanks for your help.
Cheers 
Jan
